Title: Get Drew
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Dave Andron, VJ Boyd, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Drew Thompson slips through the fingers of Raylan, Boyd, and the Detroit mob, and sets off a breakneck race to find him.
